definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Ten nets are exquisite and regular, seemlingly having gained mercy of gods.
sentences.chinese: 網織的精巧而規矩，八卦形的張開，彷彿得到神主。

sentences.english: Chinese stitchery, you know, is beautifully patterned and exquisitely embroidered.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，中國刺繡品圖案精美，繡工精巧。

sentences.english: Seen under a microscope , a fresh snowflake has a delicate six-pointed shape.
sentences.chinese: 在顯微鏡下觀察，剛飄下的雪花呈精巧的六角形。

sentences.english: This is a nifty feature that can come in handy for avid users.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個對於熱心用戶可以派上用場的精巧功能。

sentences.english: The whole building is unique in sculpt and delicacy in carving skill, having strong feeling of Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 整座建築造型別致，雕工精巧，具有濃郁的元代風格。

sentences.english: Emphasis was thus placed on a slim, refined design.
sentences.chinese: 強度感也因此被置入到了這樣一個精巧修長的設計中。

sentences.english: The most subtle dialectics always end in nostalgia.
sentences.chinese: 最爲精巧的辯證法總是結尾於懷舊。

sentences.english: A small beaded bag is wonderful for weddings elegant attire.
sentences.chinese: 精巧鑲珠飾的包比較適合參加婚禮的優雅服飾。

sentences.english: Our next stop is the exquisitely tasteful Massaya winery.
sentences.chinese: 我們的下一站是精巧雅緻的Massaya酒莊。

sentences.english: The instrument is characterized by it compactness and portability .
sentences.chinese: 這臺儀器的特點是結構精巧，攜帶方便。

sentences.english: This allowed them to finely control the curvature of their structures.
sentences.chinese: 這使他們能夠精巧地控制他們所設計結構的曲率。

sentences.english: Wedgwood, stands for the world's most exquisite porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 偉吉伍德，是世界上最精巧的瓷器，檔次的代名詞。

sentences.english: This is one of the most elegant ones.
sentences.chinese: 最精巧的還要數這一幅。

sentences.english: Designing science in the efficacious canal, the building is exquisite.
sentences.chinese: 靈渠設計科學，建築精巧。

sentences.english: It is a wonder of delicate workmanship.
sentences.chinese: 這件是手藝精巧的稀貴珍品。

sentences.english: And he had many luxuries, such as subtle watches and expensive cars.
sentences.chinese: 並且他有許多奢侈品，例如精巧的手錶和昂貴的汽車。

definition: original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
lit. fine sculpting (idiom); fig. to work with extreme care and precision
